snippet.textDisplay: Hmm. Trying to remember how I felt about the different versions of this. Better than IV (all are), close to par with III and Bloodlines, but nowhere near the PCE (doesn't retain the drama/creepiness and some samples are hideous). I would figure it couldn't be helped since the SNES version of the game was so watered down, but I still think that the SNES version of Bloodlines sounds better than the PCE version. ㄟ㋛ㄏ Riddling that out....
snippet.textOriginal: Hmm. Trying to remember how I felt about the different versions of this. Better than IV (all are), close to par with III and Bloodlines, but nowhere near the PCE (doesn't retain the drama/creepiness and some samples are hideous). I would figure it couldn't be helped since the SNES version of the game was so watered down, but I still think that the SNES version of Bloodlines sounds better than the PCE version. ㄟ㋛ㄏ Riddling that out....
